content.rendered:
Our 2020 Impact Report gives you an insight into our progress towards our vision. It provides an overview of our global advocacy influence, our work with children and families, and key achievements and milestones.

The report also gives an overview our financial performance for that year, including where our income came from and how we spent it, and a thank you to all our supporters who made especially significant contributions to our work.

At the end of each report, you’ll also find our full Annual Report and Accounts, including our financial statements which share the full details of our annual income, expenditure and financial position.

Our 2021 Impact Report, including our latest Annual Report and Accounts, will be available in June 2022.

Our 2020 Impact report

To read our 2020 impact report in full, download it below.

Impact Report 2020

Previous reports

If you’d like to read our previous Impact Reports or Annual Report and Accounts, just download them via the links below.

Impact Report 2019
Impact Report 2018
Impact Report 2017

Annual reports and accounts

Annual Report and Accounts 2020
Annual Report and Accounts 2019
Annual Report and Accounts 2018
Annual Report and Accounts 2017
Annual Report and Accounts 2016
Annual Report and Accounts 2015
Annual Report and Accounts 2014
Annual Report and Accounts 2013
